metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5436 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A heap buffer overflow in the TFTP receiving code allows for DoS or arbitrary code execution in libcurl versions 7.19.4 through 7.64.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.20+esm2
libcurl3 - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.20+esm2
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.20+esm2
libcurl3-nss - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.20+esm2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.35.0-1ubuntu2.20+esm2').
